name: Filipe Lima
title: Software Engineer
description: Hey there! I'm a passionate Front-end Engineer who loves building beautiful and functional websites and tools. I've got some pretty solid technical skills under my belt, including React.js, Typescript, and Scss, which help me work efficiently and effectively. I'm especially skilled at replicating interfaces, so you can count on me to make your designs come to life. Take a look around my portfolio and feel free to reach out if you're interested in working together!
